label: 本所, 本家
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: supreme proprietor of an estate, the highest-ranking party in the estate hierarchy, and usually a member of the royal family or a powerful courtier. Often translated as patron or guarantor.
